manual.intro: This manual describes the procedures and guidelines for organizational operations and processes.

section3.title: 3. Conclusion
section3.content: Add final information and important considerations here.

checklist.title: Checklist
checklist.intro: Use this checklist to ensure all items are verified and completed systematically.

notes.title: Notes
notes.content: Add additional observations, important notes, or exceptions identified during verification.

guide.title: Quick Reference Guide
guide.intro: This guide provides quick and practical information about processes and procedures to facilitate task execution.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: This guide presents a summary of the main concepts and processes related to the topic, serving as a quick reference for consultation.

tips.title: Important Tips
tips.tip3: Follow the order of steps for best results
tips.tip4: In case of doubt, consult the responsible party

troubleshooting.item2: Consult the frequently asked questions (FAQ) section

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality Agreement
confidentiality.intro: This agreement establishes confidentiality conditions between the involved parties, ensuring protection of sensitive information.

section1.title: 1. Definitions
section1.content: For purposes of this agreement, "Confidential Information" means all information, data, documents and materials provided by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.
section1.detail: This includes, but is not limited to: commercial, technical, financial, strategic information, customer lists, processes, methods and any other information considered confidential.

section2.title: 2. Obligations
section2.item1: Keep all confidential information absolutely secret
section2.item2: Not disclose information to third parties without prior written authorization
section2.item3: Use information only for the purposes specified in this agreement
section2.item4: Take all reasonable measures to protect confidential information

section3.title: 3. Term
section3.content: This agreement remains in effect for a period of [period] from the date of signature.
section3.detail: Confidentiality obligations will remain valid even after the agreement ends, as specified.

section4.title: 4. Exceptions
section4.content: Confidentiality obligations do not apply to information that: (a) was already publicly known; (b) was independently developed; (c) was received from third parties without restrictions; or (d) is required by law.

proposal.title: Commercial Proposal
proposal.intro: This proposal has been specially developed to meet your needs and objectives, presenting a complete and personalized solution.

executive.title: Executive Summary
executive.content: This proposal presents a complete and personalized solution to meet the client's specific needs.
executive.detail: Our goal is to deliver exceptional results that exceed expectations and add significant value to your business.

section1.title: 1. Problem Understanding
section1.content: Based on our detailed analysis, we have identified the following challenges:

section2.title: 2. Proposed Solution
section2.content: Our solution includes the following benefits:
section2.detail: Our approach is based on market best practices and proven experience in similar projects.

section3.title: 3. Investment
section3.note: All amounts include taxes and can be paid in installments as per commercial agreement.

section4.title: 4. Timeline
section4.intro: The project will be executed in well-defined phases:

section5.title: 5. Next Steps
section5.content: To start this project, we need:
section5.closing: We are available to clarify any questions and start this project as soon as possible.

section1.title: 1. Object of the Agreement
section1.content: This agreement has as its object the provision of services of [service description], as specified in this document.

section2.title: 2. Execution Term
section2.content: Services will be executed within a period of [period], counting from the date of signature of this agreement.

section4.title: 4. Contractor's Obligations
section4.item1: Provide all information and documents necessary for service execution
section4.item2: Make payments as agreed and within established deadlines

section5.title: 5. Contracted's Obligations
section5.item1: Execute services with quality and according to agreed specifications
section5.item2: Meet established deadlines and communicate any delays in advance

section6.title: 6. Termination
section6.content: This agreement may be terminated by either party with [period] prior notice, without prejudice to obligations already assumed.

section7.title: 7. Jurisdiction
section7.content: The jurisdiction of [city] is elected to resolve issues arising from this agreement.

section1.title: 1. Objective
section1.content: This policy establishes guidelines and standards for [policy objective], ensuring consistency and compliance throughout the organization.

section2.title: 2. Scope
section2.content: This policy applies to [who it applies to], including employees, partners and involved third parties.

section5.title: 5. Review
section5.content: This policy will be reviewed annually or as needed, ensuring its update and relevance.

section1.title: 1. Objective
section1.content: This procedure describes the step-by-step process for [procedure objective], ensuring standardization and quality.

section2.title: 2. Scope
section2.content: Applies to [specific area/process] and must be followed by all involved.
